body:
Known mostly for his still-lifes, little is known of Abberlyâ€™s life or training. He often combined an outdoor still-life of apples or corn with a squirrel for delightfully charming compositions. Abberly exhibited at the National Academy of Design, New York City.

**Additional Information for Elias Abberley**

* Active/worked: New York City; Brooklyn, NY.
* Exhibited: National Academy of Design, New York City.
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 11.5 x 15.5 inches / Signed lower left
metaTitle: Elias Abberly Painting - Delightful Find - 19th Century American Fine Art

title: Delightful Find
